description: Allows the user to record the net weight of one or more output containers for the current Order/Batch/Unit Procedure. Displays instructions, accepts container IDs via scan or entry, shows actual quantity, tare weight, and gross weight, and lets the user add weights to a list or record notes/exceptions.
intent: To capture and record the yield weight information of product containers into the system.

outputs.YieldWeigh: Yield weigh value and unit of measure (recipe variable)

preconditions: The unit of measure of the output product must be 'EA' to calculate conversion factor
postconditions: Yield weight information is committed and the page closes
Weighed containers are added to the list of recorded yields
side_effects: Enforces operator signature based on the WEIGH_MAN_SIGN configurable parameter (default: Double Signature)
example_usage: Use this phase in a unit procedure to scan each output container, record its net weight, and commit the yield data to the batch record.
